perturbation.original_text: Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter annually, at the Company's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: This change modifies the payment schedule from a defined quarterly basis to an annual payment at the company's discretion. California law requires more frequent payment schedules in many contexts, particularly concerning charitable donations linked to sales. This change creates ambiguity and potential non-compliance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California Corporations Code regarding charitable donations and reporting requirements.

perturbation.original_text: The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company's Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company is not obligated to provide sales reports to the NFLA-NC.
perturbation.explanation: This removes the obligation for the company to provide sales reports. California law requires transparency and accountability for charitable donations, implying a right to access relevant sales data. Eliminating this requirement directly contradicts these principles.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California Corporations Code regarding transparency and accountability for charitable donations.

perturbation.original_text:
Parties agree to the addition of Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotic™ Water to "Licensed Products" as follows:

 SECTION ONE. DEFINITIONS    As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows:

     F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Parties agree to the addition of Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotic™ Water to "Licensed Products" as follows:

 SECTION ONE. DEFINITIONS    As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows:

     F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. The Company can add other products to the list of Licensed Products without requiring a written amendment to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This modification allows the Company to add other products to the Licensed Products list without written amendment. This undermines contract law principles requiring mutual consent for contract modifications. California law requires written agreements for modifications of contracts if the original contract is written.
